00034 /*
00035  * $Log$
00036  * Revision 1.10  2009/01/16 17:03:02  haraldkipp
00037  * Configurable host name length. The *nix conditional is
00038  * no longer required as this will be handled in the nvmem
00039  * routines. NutLoadConfig will now set the virgin host
00040  * name, if no valid configuration is available. Cookie
00041  * and virgin host name are configurable too, but disabled
00042  * in the Configurator until we fixed the string value
00043  * problem. You may use UserConf.mk instead.
00044  *
00045  * Revision 1.9  2006/05/25 09:18:28  haraldkipp
00046  * API documentation updated and corrected.
00047  *
00048  * Revision 1.8  2006/01/23 19:50:48  haraldkipp
00049  * Dummy NVMEM configuration for GBA added.
00050  *
00051  * Revision 1.7  2006/01/23 17:26:17  haraldkipp
00052  * Platform independant routines added, which provide generic access to
00053  * non-volatile memory.
00054  *
00055  * Revision 1.6  2005/07/26 15:49:59  haraldkipp
00056  * Cygwin support added.
00057  *

00059  * No EEPROM support for AT91
00060  *

00066  *
00067  * Revision 1.2  2004/03/03 17:42:19  drsung
00068  * Bugfix in NutSaveConfig. Write only to eeprom if actual byte in
00069  * eeprom differs from byte to write.

00079 #include <cfg/arch.h>
00080 #include <sys/nutdebug.h>
00081 #include <sys/confos.h>
00082 #include <dev/nvmem.h>
00083 
00084 #include <string.h>
00085 
00090 
00097 CONFOS confos;
00098 
00114 int NutLoadConfig(void)
00115 {
00116     /* Sanity check. */
00117     NUTASSERT(sizeof(CONFOS) <= 255);
00118 
00119     if (NutNvMemLoad(CONFOS_EE_OFFSET, &confos, sizeof(CONFOS)) == 0 /* If loaded... */
00120         && confos.size == sizeof(CONFOS) /* ...check magic size and cookie. */
00121         && memcmp(confos.magic, CONFOS_EE_MAGIC, sizeof(CONFOS_EE_MAGIC) - 1) == 0) {
00122             return 0;
00123     }
00124 
00125     /* No valid configuration, set virgin hostname. */
00126     NUTASSERT(sizeof(confos.hostname) > strlen(CONFOS_VIRGIN_HOSTNAME));
00127     strcpy(confos.hostname, CONFOS_VIRGIN_HOSTNAME);
00128 
00129     return -1;
00130 }
00131 
00142 int NutSaveConfig(void)
00143 {
00144     /* Sanity checks. */
00145     NUTASSERT(sizeof(CONFOS) <= 255);
00146     NUTASSERT(strlen(confos.hostname) <= MAX_HOSTNAME_LEN);
00147 
00148     /* Update the magic part. */
00149     confos.size = sizeof(CONFOS);
00150     memcpy(confos.magic, CONFOS_EE_MAGIC, sizeof(CONFOS_EE_MAGIC) - 1);
00151 
00152     return NutNvMemSave(CONFOS_EE_OFFSET, &confos, sizeof(CONFOS));
00153 }
